reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch, 15A 120/277V, Paddle Light Switch, On/Off Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: After I got these I put them aside while I gathered other switches and sockets I wanted to replace. After the return date, I lined these up in a 3-gang switch plate and only then realized the switch is more of a light cream color so doesn't match switches I've got from 2 other manufacturers (smart switches). Too late to return so I'll probably give these to Goodwill. Bestten has two versions of white: items marked USWP4 (like this one) which they call white but is actually off-white, and USWP6 that they call Snow White. Most other brands mean the 'sniw white' bright white when they say white. Make sure you match. I found out too late and can't use these. I've submitted a description update request to ask them to mark these as off-white.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
reviews.title: Not a bright white switch color - does not match other brands

reviews.userName: Awesome little vacuum cleaner for the price. Works great on stairs and flat surfaces. The attachments help out a lot.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch, 15A 120/277V, Paddle Light Switch, On/Off Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I had purchased this product before and was satisfied with the quality, but unfortunately, my recent purchase has been a huge disappointment. Out of the 10-pack, two switches had serious issues where the internal mechanism was broken. This caused the switch to pop out dangerously when pressed, which is a major safety hazard, especially if children are around. I expected consistent quality, but this second batch has clearly suffered from poor quality control. I can't recommend this product anymore given the potential risks involved.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2024
reviews.title: No more

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch, 15A 120/277V, Paddle Light Switch, On/Off Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Purchased two packs of these light switches. They look great, however the quality is terrible. Had 6 out of the 20 that I bought with the back black plastic broken and the switch falling a part. Was under a time crunch to finish a project and ended up going to Home Depot and buying the light switches i needed. Maybe it was just bad luck but don’t let the price fool you and influence your decision to purchase something that you will possibly put in your home. Home Depot is not that much more money for a better quality item.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
reviews.title: Very poor quality

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch, 15A 120/277V, Paddle Light Switch, On/Off Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Go buy the Leviton. Cheaper anyway, at least the old school one. These are cheaply made and feel it. The rocker "rocks" in the frame before engaging. The color is not the same white as others. A bit off and more yellow. OK if you are replacing all switches, but you really cannot use these next to another brand. Just look odd. Also, the quick release is troublesome if you need to take the wire out. These are not worth the added work and flimsy build quality. I bought a box of 10. Arrived today and going back today.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2024
reviews.title: Best to pass on these. Flimsy and color off. Other better quality ones at same or lower price

Well packaged, quickly delivered. Their products are made for ease of accurate and safe installation. In my experience, the products are reliable as well.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch, 15A 120/277V, Paddle Light Switch, On/Off Rocker Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These switches work fine, although they definitely feel a little cheap. My biggest issue is that although they're listed as gloss white, they are definitely more of a off-white/cream color and this becomes painfully obvious against the wall plate as well as the four-way switches that I have mixed in placed right next to the single-pole switches. Be aware if you have three- or four-way switches right next to these. Would have loved to know this before I bought and my husband installed 30 of these.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2024
reviews.title: Be aware - not true white
